text.tspan: Kernel & Core Extensions: PostgreSQL 13/14, PostGIS 3.1, TimescaleDB 2.3, Citus 10
Reliable pg middlewares : Patroni 2.1, Pgbouncer1.15, Haproxy 2.2, Consul 1.10
Production-grade runtime: Grafana 8.0, Prometheus 2.28, Nginx 1.20, Ansible
to Create & Manage HA PostgreSQL Clusters
on your Laptop with one click!
Deliver with 20+ fine-grained grafana dashboards with fullly-covered navigation links to rollup & drill-down
system based on both Prometheus+AlertManager & Grafana
Ship with 1000+ metrics from postgres, middleware, node and proxy. Bring insight from largest sharding cluster to smallest object
Realtime logging collecting solution (optional) with loki and promtail
Resilient postgres cluster that can automatically recover from common failures, the cluster serves (rw/ro) until last instance dies
Descriptive configuration allows you to fully customize your database just like kubernetes
Built-in playbooks to create scale destroy pgsql cluster, create business database & users & services. optional CMDB & GUI support
Pull-up production-grade postgres database on your laptop (1-node, 4-node sandbox) or create them on cloud VPS with minimal config
Exploring & Learning PostgreSQL in real environment. Doing experiment and designing prototypes apps with realtime visual feedbacks
Designing & sharing & delivering data visualization application with deterministic environment with handy toolsets
Everything is just ready for production with one command, in 10 minutes from a fresh node without internet access
Integrated service-discovery that minimize manual intervene
Designed for large scale production databases, but also available on 1C|1GB local vm node. keep all your environment consistent
